verses.verse: If<WG1437> I speak<WG2980> with the tongues<WG1100> of men<WG444> and of angels,<WG32> but do not have<WG2192> love,<WG26> I have become<WG1096> a noisy<WG2278> gong<WG5475> or<WG2228> a clanging<WG214> cymbal.<WG2950>

And if<WG1437> I have<WG2192> [the gift of] prophecy,<WG4394> and know<WG3609> all<WG3956> mysteries<WG3466> and all<WG3956> knowledge;<WG1108> and if<WG1437> I have<WG2192> all<WG3956> faith,<WG4102> so<WG5620> as to remove<WG3179> mountains,<WG3735> but do not have<WG2192> love,<WG26> I am<WG1510> nothing.<WG3762>

And if<WG1437> I give<WG5595> all<WG3956> my possessions<WG5225> to feed<WG5595> [the poor,] and if<WG1437> I deliver<WG3860> my body<WG4983> to be burned,<WG2545> but do not have<WG2192> love,<WG26> it profits<WG5623> me nothing.<WG3762>
Love<WG26> is patient,<WG3114> love<WG26> is kind,<WG5541> [and] is not jealous;<WG2206> love<WG26> does not brag<WG4068> [and] is not arrogant,<WG5448>
does not act<WG807> unbecomingly;<WG807> it does not seek<WG2212> its own,<WG1438> is not provoked,<WG3947> does not take<WG3049> into account<WG3049> a wrong<WG2556> [suffered,]
does not rejoice<WG5463> in unrighteousness,<WG93> but rejoices<WG4796> with the truth;<WG225>
bears<WG4722> all<WG3956> things,<WG3956> believes<WG4100> all<WG3956> things,<WG3956> hopes<WG1679> all<WG3956> things,<WG3956> endures<WG5278> all<WG3956> things.<WG3956>

Love<WG26> never<WG3763> fails;<WG4098> but if<WG1535> [there are gifts of] prophecy,<WG4394> they will be done<WG2673> away;<WG2673> if<WG1535> [there are] tongues,<WG1100> they will cease;<WG3973> if<WG1535> [there is] knowledge,<WG1108> it will be done<WG2673> away.<WG2673>
For we know<WG1097> in part,<WG3313> and we prophesy<WG4395> in part;<WG3313>
but when<WG3752> the perfect<WG5046> comes,<WG2064> the partial<WG3313> will be done<WG2673> away.<WG2673>

When<WG3753> I was a child,<WG3516> I used to speak<WG2980> as a child,<WG3516> think<WG5426> as a child,<WG3516> reason<WG3049> as a child;<WG3516> when<WG3753> I became<WG1096> a man,<WG435> I did<WG2673> away<WG2673> with childish<WG3516> things.

For now<WG737> we see<WG991> in a mirror<WG2072> dimly,<WG135> but then<WG5119> face<WG4383> to face;<WG4383> now<WG737> I know<WG1097> in part,<WG3313> but then<WG5119> I shall know<WG1921> fully<WG1921> just<WG2531> as I also<WG2532> have been fully<WG1921> known.<WG1921>
But now<WG3570> abide<WG3306> faith,<WG4102> hope,<WG1680> love,<WG26> these<WG3778> three;<WG5140> but the greatest<WG3173> of these<WG3778> is love.<WG26>
